query.statement: SELECT EXIST_YN1, EXIST_YN2 FROM ( SELECT DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_HMR_PRICE WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND CLS4_CODE = #CLS4_CODE# AND START_DATE = #START_DATE#), 0, 'N','Y') EXIST_YN1, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_HMR_MST WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM MAS_HMR_MAP WHERE MAP_CD = MAS_HMR_MST.MAP_CD AND CLS4_CODE = #CLS4_CODE#) AND TRX_DATE >= #START_DATE#), 0, 'N','Y') EXIST_YN2 FROM DUAL )
